Text: Meeting in Houston Cc Hi Jeffrey We met at the opening of the Contemporary Art Museums opening of the Yoko Ono exhibition and I would be delighted to see you on my forthcoming trip to Houston to lecture next week Would you be free for a quick chat the afternoon of September I would be interested in learning more about Enrons support of the arts and its ties to Japan and would welcome the chance to describe our activities to you Looking forward to hearing from you Sincerely Alexandra Munroe Director Japan Society Gallery Tel Fax
